education.institute: Malta College for Arts, Science and Technology (MCAST)
education.course: Bachelor of Science (Honours) in Software Development
education.description: Focuses on creating software applications using formal design patterns, and solving complex real-world problems using formal methodologies. Includes units such as secure software development, server-side and client-side scripting, discrete mathematics, and other similar modules.

education.institute: Malta College for Arts, Science and Technology (MCAST)
education.course: Advanced Diploma in IT (Multimedia Software Development)
education.description: Focuses on software development skills along with the necessary knowledge for multimedia artefact development, manipulation and integration. Includes units such as game development, mobile application development, database design, website development, and other similar modules.

bullets: Intermediates - Physics, Marketing, English, System Of Knowledge
O Levels - Maltese, English, Maths, Religion, Physics, Computer Studies, Graphical Communication, and ECDL Standard Level
